content.query:
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
    *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK ''calendar.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] '

SELECT 
    MAX(LEN(date_key)) AS date_key_len,
    MAX(LEN(year)) AS year_len,
    MAX(LEN(month)) AS month_len,
    MAX(LEN(day)) AS day_len,
    MAX(LEN(day_name)) AS day_name_len,
    MAX(LEN(day_of_year)) AS day_of_year_len,
    MAX(LEN(week_of_year)) AS week_of_year_len,
    MAX(LEN(month_name)) AS month_name_len,
    MAX(LEN(year_month)) AS year_month_len,
    MAX(LEN(year_week)) AS year_week_len
FROM 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT 
    *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    ) 
    WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date DATE,
        year INT,
        month INT,
        day INT,
        day_name VARCHAR(15),
        day_of_year INT,
        week_of_year INT,
        month_name VARCHAR(15),
        year_month VARCHAR(15),
        year_week INT
    ) AS [result]
